direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check the state of the queue but for different conditions (empty vs. full capacity).
Both methods involve checking the state of the queue and use similar logic to determine the state.
The clear method resets the queue state, which can be used to test the isEmpty method by ensuring the queue is empty after clearing.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding elements to the queue can be used to set up a non-empty state for testing the isEmpty method.
Removing elements from the queue can be used to transition from a non-empty to an empty state, which is relevant for testing the isEmpty method.
The size method can be used to verify the state of the queue after invoking the isEmpty method, ensuring that the queue is indeed empty.
